natural solution: We can then repeatedly apply a difference of squares factorization: \begin{align} x^8-256&=(x^4+16)(x^4-16)\\ &=(x^4+16)(x^2+4)(x^2-4)\\ &=\boxed{(x^4+16)(x^2+4)(x+2)(x-2)}\\ \end{align}

- $R(x) = x^2 + 4$
